1370: Ricout moved to Die Camp.B.10 after marriage.
Got married to Thedwi at age 19 in 1370.
Had a son with Thedwi, Walramus, at age 19.
1371: Had a son with Thedwi, Wauthem, at age 20.
1372: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Marcibilia, at age 21.
1373: Had a son with Thedwi, Laurens, at age 22.
1376: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Hersewindis, at age 25.
1378: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Volcwiif, at age 27.
Became caretaker of Walramus, Wauthem, Marcibilia, Laurens, Hersewindis, Volcwiif at age 28.
1383: Lost daughter Volcwiif when Volcwiif was 6 years old.
